plot: Five friends are trying to make a pilot episode for a web series. They don't know anything about movies, so they buy the weekly lessons by professor Marco called My Tutorials. This is the worst professor ever, and they will learn from him.
plot_en: Five friends are trying to make a pilot episode for a web series. They don't know anything about movies, so they buy the weekly lessons by professor Marco called My Tutorials. This is the worst professor ever, and they will learn from him.
plot_es: Five friends are trying to make a pilot episode for a web series. They don't know anything about movies, so they buy the weekly lessons by professor Marco called My Tutorials. This is the worst professor ever, and they will learn from him.
title: La serie online (en fascículos)
